hera.api

Interface AccountOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountTemplate

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface AccountOperation
    Provide account related operations. It provides followings:
    • lookup account state
    • naming related operations
    • staking related operations
    • signing / verifying

        @Deprecated
TxHash createName(Account account,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              long nonce)
        Deprecated. 
        Will be removed in 1.2. Use createName(Signer, String, long) instead.
        Parameters:
        account - an account
        name - an new name
        nonce - an nonce which is used in a transaction
        Returns:
        a create name transaction hash

      • createName

        TxHash createName(Signer signer,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  long nonce)
        Create name info of an account. Created name will be owned by signer.
        Parameters:
        signer - a signer
        name - an new name
        nonce - an nonce which is used in a transaction
        Returns:
        a create name transaction hash

      • updateName

        TxHash updateName(Account owner,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  AccountAddress newOwner,
                  long nonce)
        Will be removed in 1.2. Use updateName(Signer, String, AccountAddress, long) instead.
        Parameters:
        owner - an account
        name - an already binded name
        newOwner - an new owner of name
        nonce - an nonce which is used in a transaction
        Returns:
        a update name transaction hash

      • updateName

        TxHash updateName(Signer signer,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  AccountAddress newOwner,
                  long nonce)
        Update name info of an account. An signer must be owner of name.
        Parameters:
        signer - a signer
        name - an already binded name
        newOwner - an new owner of name
        nonce - an nonce which is used in a transaction
        Returns:
        a update name transaction hash

        Get owner of an account name.
        Parameters:
        name - an name of account
        Returns:
        an account address binded with name

      • getNameOwner

        AccountAddress getNameOwner(java.lang.String name,
                            long blockNumber)
        Get owner of an account name at block blockNumber.
        Parameters:
        name - an name of account
        blockNumber - a block number
        Returns:
        an account address binded with name. null if is has no owner

      • stake

             Aer amount,

        amount - an amount to stake

      • vote

        TxHash vote(Signer signer,
            java.lang.String voteId,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> candidates,
            long nonce)
        Vote to candidates with corresponding voteId. Pre-defined vote id is followings:
        • "voteBP"
        A signer must have staked aergo.
        Parameters:
        signer - a signer
        voteId - a vote id
        candidates - a candidates
        nonce - an nonce which is used in a transaction
        Returns:
        voting transaction hash

      • getVotesOf

        Get votes which accountAddress votes for.
        Parameters:
        accountAddress - an account address
        Returns:
        voting info

      • listElected

        java.util.List<ElectedCandidate> listElected(java.lang.String voteId,
                                             int showCount)
        Get elected candidates per voteId for current round.
        Parameters:
        voteId - a vote id
        showCount - a show count
        Returns:
        a vote total

      • sign

        Transaction sign(Account account,
                 RawTransaction rawTransaction)
        Will be removed in 1.2. Use TxSigner.sign(RawTransaction) instead.
        Parameters:
        account - an account to sign
        rawTransaction - a raw transaction to sign
        Returns:
        signed transaction

      • verify

        boolean verify(Account account,
               Transaction transaction)
        Will be removed in 1.2. Use AergoSignVerifier.verify(Transaction) instead.
        Parameters:
        account - an account to verify
        transaction - a signed transaction to verify
        Returns:
        verification result
